page.title: 01GAZATEER OF HARDWICK & AREA
page.content: A scattered population of about 350 people of al ages live in this quiet rural area covering the parishes of Hardwick most of Shelton & parts of Long Stratton,Morningthorpe,Pulham St Mary,Pulham Market & Starston. Different authorities administer, Hardwick has Norwich postal,water, telephone & electricity services, southwards is under Diss.The area has separate Parish,District & County Councillors & 2 Rural Deaneries. The small community at Hardwick has a well used Post Office/Shop,Village Hall & Church.Although a bus goes to town 3 days a week most people rely on their own transport.There are deliveries of papers,milk,bread,meat, mobile library & hairdresser.Thesetoo go to most of the hamlets,farms & small businesses in this agricultural area where arable crops predominate.
